data.text: You have always been the most supportive and friendly dad in the world. Happy birthday to you
A father hold his dauthers hand for a short while but he hold her heart forever
Thank you for being the superman in my life Happy birthday to dear dad
Happy birthday dad I wish nothing but absolute best for you as this is what you truly deserve
I feel truly lucky to have such a loving, caring and encouraging father. Wishing you an entirely peaceful day
I do not need Aladdins genie to fulfill my wishes in life, because I have my dad. Happy birthday, papa
I do not ever feel hopeless in life because I know you are always there to hold me up. Happy birthday
You have given me life, love, and laughter. Happy birthday to the most lovable dad in the world
Some people do not believe in heroes but they have not met my dad
Happiest birthday to the most handsome and kindhearted man that I have ever known
Being a father is a tough but incredibly fulfilling job and letting Dad know how important he is makes his job even more rewarding
I think a father is someone,Who loves unconditionally,There is no perfect formula,To who a father can be
You mean everything to me. Without you, I could never be the person I am today. Happy birthday papa
Thanks for my friend rather than just being my dad. Happy birthday
Happy birthday to the most caring and supportive father out there, I know you are always here for me.
Happy birthday, dad. I hope and wish every day to become half as amazing dad as you are
Thanks for believing in me and being there for me. Hope you have a great day papa
Dear dad, on your birthday, I want you to know that you are truly an inspiration, a friend and a teacher to all of us
Its a blessing to be a part of you. Happy birthday to my dear dad
May the coming years of your life be filled with unlimited happiness and joys
I love you to infinity and beyond. Happy birthday to the most amazing dad ever
You always make me feel safe and secure with your unconditional love, Happy birthday dad
Happy Birthday To my amazing dad, I hope celebration of this year is the biggest and brightest one yet
Happy Birthday To My Wonderful Father. You are such a caring and thoughtful father
Wishing you, my AWESOME father, a birthday you will never forget and the hope of a FANTASTIC year
